entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
